overview: Dr. Snodgrass founded VistaGen in 1998 and has been its Chief Executive Officer since inception. Prior to VistaGen, he was Chief Scientific Officer of Progenitor, Inc. Dr. Snodgrass has a Ph.D. from the University of Pennsylvania and has over 13 years experience in senior management and over 10 years research experience as a professor at the Lineberger Comprehensive Cancer Center, University North Carolina Chapel Hill School of Medicine, and as a member of the Institute for Immunology, Basel, Switzerland. Dr. Snodgrass is a past Board Member of the Emerging Company Section of the Biotechnology Industry Organization (BIO), and is a recognized pioneering expert in stem cell biology with more than 20 years experience in the uses of stem cells as biological tools for drug discovery.
